author: Nick Gaskell
comment: These guys, these guys though. Had a problem they be all cool said we gotta fix it. Cool London vibe, I use it to impress girls that really dig London.
title: Pretty dope designers

author: Tara Murphy
comment: Love this and the other city faces available! (A Toronto face would be cool, hint hint)
title: Adorable!

author: Yusuf Ahmed
comment: Great watch face definitely recommend it. Looking forward to seeing more watch faces by sol. 화이팅
title: Great

author: Siying Liu
comment: I really like the design.  The bus and cab are so cute that I sometimes just stare at them instead of time :) But I will like it more if it can show the difference between day and night.  I think the night of London will be beautiful on my watch ;-)
title: Lovely watch face
